Jokić imao poseban razgovor sa Malounom
03 Nov 2019, 10:55 by Nemanja
Trener Denver Nagetsa Majk Maloun održao je poseban razgovor sa Nikolom Jokićem uoči utakmice sa Orlandom zahtevajući da srpski centar bude agresivniji.
Jutro pre utakmice sa Orlandom, Maloun je pozvao Jokića, koji je u prethodne tri utakmice pružio partije van svojih mogućnosti, i rekao mu da bude agresivniji protiv Orlanda, te preuzme minimum 15 šuteva, preneli su mediji bliski klubu.
Utakmica sa ekipom iz Floride nije počela onako kako su se trener i igrač dogovorili, te je Jokić posle prve deonice bio bez šuta iz igre, bez skoka i asistencije. Do kraja poluvremena, upisao je, za njegove standarde, tek četiri poena. To je navelo navijače da se na društvenim mrežama pitaju ima li srpski centar problema sa formom zbog privatnih problema ili je razlog lošoj igri nešto drugo.
Prvi centar ekipe je ubrzo razuverio sve neverne Tome i u drugom poluvremenu počeo da igra onako kako ih je navikao. Tako je meč završio sa 20 poena, sedam skokova i četiri asistencije, pogodivši i neke zahtevne šuteve.
Podsetimo, kritike na račun Nikole Jokića pojavile su se nakon nešto slabijih izdanja u polju efikasnosti u duelima sa Nju Orelansom gde je postigao 13 poena, Dalasom – 10 (imao tripl-dabl) i Sakramentom, gde je upisao devet poena.

Jokic had a special conversation with Maloun
03 Nov 2019, 10:55 by Nemanja
Denver Nagets coach Mike Malone had a special interview with Nikola Jokic ahead of the game with Orlando demanding that the Serbian center be more aggressive.
The morning before the match with Orlando, Maloun called Jokic, who had given the parties outside his options in the past three games, and told him to be more aggressive against Orlando and take a minimum of 15 shots, media close to the club reported.
The match with the Florida team did not start the way the coach and player agreed, so after the first leg, Jokic was without a shot from the game, without a jump and an assist. By the end of the half, he had scored, by his standards, just four points. This led fans to wonder on social networks whether the Serbian center has problems with form due to private issues or the reason for the poor game is something else.
The first center of the team soon unleashed all the unbelieving Tomas and in the second half started playing the way he used to. So the match ended with 20 points, seven rebounds and four assists, hitting some challenging shots.
Recall criticism at the expense of Nikola Jokic came after slightly weaker issues in the field of efficiency in duels with New Orelans, where he scored 13 points, Dallas - 10 (had a triple-double) and Sacramento, where he scored nine points.
